GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.10.38
GSD.description:
f2fs: compress: fix race condition of overwrite vs truncate

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.38 by commit 5639b73fd3bc6fc8ca72e3a9ac15aacaabd7ebff, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit 4c8ff7095bef64fc47e996a938f7d57f9e077da3. For more details please see the references link.
